explains: vt. 蒙住；裹住；抑制；发低沉的声音
n. 低沉的声音；消声器；包裹物（如头巾，围巾等）；唇鼻部
wordGroup: muffle furnace 马弗炉；隔焰炉；回热炉

sentences.en: He tried to muffle the alarm clock by putting it under his pillow.
sentences.cn: 他把闹钟塞在枕头底下，想减低声音。

sentences.en: Blake held his handkerchief over the mouthpiece to muffle his voice.
sentences.cn: 布莱克用手帕遮住话筒来压低声音。

sentences.en: He is suffering from... leukemia '. She paused to muffle her sobs.
sentences.cn: 他患了…白血病“她小声说道，哽咽着。”
